message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $115. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am willing to pay up to $100 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a bit more than that. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $107.50?
Hello Alice, thank you for your follow-up offer. I understand your position, but I would like to stick to my initial budget of $100. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.
